items.text: width offered full outside off, can't drive this past cover. Mistimed back to Raza
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full outside off, big stride forward and defended
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: overpitched full outside off, prods forward and defends to see the over out
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, spins in, defended off the front foot. Tight bowling
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, goes deep into his crease and taps it back to Cremer
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up full on middle stump, tries to work it towards midwicket but takes the leading edge. Not quite timed, as it falls just short of Cremer. Could've been a catch
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off stump, steps forward and drives to the man at long on
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tossed up full outside off stump, zips straight through on this occasion. Left alone by the batsman
items.shortText: Cremer to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Reju: "2 reviews umpire got it wrong. It is a tough world out there for umpires these days." -- Especially in a place as loud as Mirpur. The crowd's always great here.
items.text: full on middle stump, tapped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Cremer to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off stump, steps forward and defends to short extra cover
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: Tamim backs away towards the leg side and Raza pushes this full outside off. Does well to dig this away to cover. Tamim was almost foxed, there
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, muscled down the ground to mid on, but it's a misfield! Mire the guilty man here. Races away to the long-on boundary
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: good length on middle stump, makes room and slashes hard at it. Runs away past the short third-man fielder
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: full on middle and off, driven to cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, tapped with the bat's open face towards cover point. There's the fifty
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, steps across to the off side and goes down on one knee exposing two stumps. Tries an extravagant sweep, but mistimed to short fine leg
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on middle and leg, spins into Tamim's body, effectively cramping him. Tries to flick off his hips, but misses
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, comes down the wicket and slogs this towards cow corner, mistimed shot, but enough behind it to fetch him two
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.preText: Mahneel: "Tamim's modest 50 celebration says a lot about BD's improvement in ODIs over time. "
items.text: good length on middle stump, quick to spot the length, swivels, and lifts this over square leg. Down on one knee, and smacked over the infield behind square
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off stump, driven firmly away from his body, can't beat the man at cover though
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, Tamim walks across to the off side and sweeps once again. Takes a top edge, and over the keeper's head. More runs for the opener, who is not afraid anymore to take his chances. Exposed two stumps once again on that occasion
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.preText: Ralph Dube: "I dont understand why Williams continues to be overlooked and the dropping of Chris Mpofu. Mpofu does not give runs easily and Williams was going to have a useful contribution with both bat and ball."
items.text: full ball darted in on middle stump, tapped away towards the leg side off the front foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: gets off the mark with a six! Uses his feet to get under this ball, full on middle and smacked over the bowler's head. Lands near the sightscreen
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

items.text: full outside off stump, attempted sweep from Mushfiq, straight to short fine leg
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, worked off his toes to midwicket
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
